text:
Pharmacy Control (Fees) Regulations 2021

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, make the following regulations under the Pharmacy Control Act 2001 .

13 December 2021

B. BAKER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

JEREMY ROCKLIFF

Minister for Health

1. Short title
    These regulations may be cited as the Pharmacy Control (Fees) Regulations 2021 .

2. Commencement
    These regulations take effect on 29 December 2021.

3. Interpretation
    In these regulations –
        Act means the Pharmacy Control Act 2001 .

4. Fees
    The fees set out in Schedule 1 are prescribed for the purposes of the Act.

SCHEDULE 1 - Fees
